jKMS

Class Package

  • java.lang.Object
    • jKMS.Package

  • public class Package
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the packages for assistants. Provides support for adding, removing and some nice getter methods.
    Author:
    freeDom, siegmund42

      • getFirstCard

        public Card getFirstCard(char type)
        Returns the first Card of this package depending on the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the requested first card, could be 'b' = Buyer or 's' = Seller
        Returns:
        first Card of this Package

        Returns the Card with the given ID
        Parameters:
        ID - the Card id
        Returns:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int id)
        Checks if this Package contains a specified Card
        Parameters:
        id - the Card ID
        Returns:
        true if card with ID id is existing in this package

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • removeCards

        public boolean removeCards(int lastID)
                    throws WrongPackageException
        Remove all cards after last card from this package and the kms.cardSet
        Parameters:
        lastID - the last remaining [not distributed] Card of this package -> the first Card to remove
        Returns:
        true if all cards where removed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        WrongPackageException
